name: Planet Defender (itch)
description:
People from three little planets call for help. Asteroids and other dirty things are threatening to fall over their heads.

Don't be selfish, this could also happen to us... So pick up your mouse and try to save them ! Clic to avoid the threat !

Because we are nice we give you a little tip : in case you couldn't save the planets, you should at least try to do the best high score...

Share it on the comments !

*** "A very addictive and simple game that everyone should play. I give it five thumbs and retweet it." ***

Our coder's mother.
